titles.title: McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act
McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act
McLoughlin House Addition to Fort Vancouver National Historic Site Act
McLoughlin House Addition to Fort Vancouver National Historic Site Act
McLoughlin House Addition to Fort Vancouver National Historic Site Act

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House National Historic Site in Oregon City, Oregon, and to administer the site as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House in Oregon City, Oregon, for inclusion in Fort Vancouver Historic Site, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.
Mr. Gilchrest moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 733.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 108-66.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 130.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Pearce moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendments.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 733.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendments Agreed to by voice vote.

reference.label: text as House agreed to Senate amendment

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 7/29/2003--Public Law. McLoughlin House Addition to Fort Vancouver National Historic Site Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House (the McLoughlin House National Historic Site, including the Barclay House and other associated property and improvements) Oregon City, Oregon, from willing sellers by donation, purchase, or exchange (except that lands or interests owned by Oregon City may be acquired by donation only). Requires that the acquired property be included within the boundaries and administered as part of the Fort Vancouver National Historic Site. Directs the Secretary to rename McLoughlin House National Historic Site as McLoughlin House.
